name: Florante and Laura: The Visual Novel
name_original: Florante and Laura: The Visual Novel
description:
Florante and Laura: The Visual Novel is a visual novel adaptation for the known Filipino story, "Florante at Laura" by Francisco Balagtas #visualnovel #textadventure #other

I made this as my final project for school. I hope you could answer the survey afterwards \: https://forms.gle/yEhRwp9RTbmH8T719

Available for PC and Android
